description.value: This value set includes the codes from SNOMED CT that are included in: descendants of 373873005 \|Pharmaceutical / biologic product (product)\|, excluding the descendants of 787859002 \|Vaccine product (medicinal product)\|, plus IPS codes for absent/unknown medications.
